title: Our In-house products
text: The following are Services we do offer.

section.title: Hospital revenue system.
section.content: Revenue collection, cash and  non cash Billing Collections per department

section.title: Hospital/ community pharmacy Management
section.content: Monthly consumption averages Dispensing per mode of payment.Stock management, expires, stock levels etc

section.title: Hospital Management Information System
section.content: Patient registration, billing, Triaging.  Clerking by ICD10/11, Lab and Commodity  Management systems.Nurses cardex and Out put to KHIS.
